name: Elena Zacharenko
goal: Helping NGO and institutional clients get messages across to EU decision makers - be it on EU internal affairs, or its human rights, foreign or development policy.
interests: Development, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: I follow the work of the AFET, DROI, DEVCO, FEMM and LIBE committees.
